headline: General Motors Recalls 42,000+ Blazer EVs for Parking Brake Wiring Issue Amidst Strong Sales Growth
summary: General Motors Company (NYSE:GM) is one of the most undervalued NYSE stocks to buy now. In the first week of July, General Motors initiated a recall for over 42,000 Blazer EV vehicles from the 2024-2025 model years due to a potential issue with the rear parking brake wiring harness. headline: CARFAX Lifetime New Car Ads Approved for GM iMR Turnkey Program
summary: CARFAX has expanded its relationship with General Motors, announcing CARFAX Lifetime dealers now receive new car ad placements on CARFAX Reports, CARFAX Car Listings, and CARFAX Car Care to qualify for GM's In-Market Retail (iMR) Turnkey Program. This alignment opens the door for GM dealers with CARFAX Lifetime status to access new levels of advertising support, backed by iMR Turnkey Program funding.
